extension.name: jForms Module
extension.author: Adam Bouqdib
extension.description: A slick AJAX contact form using jForms.

field.name: introtext
field.label: Introduction text
field.description: If you want to, this is where some text will appear (at the top of the form).

field.name: thanks
field.default: Sent successfully. We will be in touch soon.
field.label: Thank you Message
field.description: Enter your thank you message which will be displayed after a successful email has been sent.

field.name: submit_label
field.label: Submit Button Text
field.description: Enter the text you would like to appear on the submit button

field.name: send_email
field.label: Send email
field.description: Send form data to a specified email address

field.name: receipt_email
field.label: Email destination
field.description: Please enter a valid email address where the form will be sent to.

field.name: subject
field.label: Email subject
field.description: Please enter a subject for the email that will be sent.

field.name: email_body
field.default:
The following user has entered a message:

{fields}
field.label: Email text
field.description: Enter some text for your body.

field.name: use_ajax
field.label: Use Ajax to send form
field.description: Use Ajax to send the form (no page reload).

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Add a suffix to the module (if you need to) which will allow individual css styling
